title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.20 - Sound reproduction ban in public transportation facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.20 - Sound reproduction ban in public transportation facility

State Regulations

No person shall operate or use any radio, television, tape
recorder or phonograph in or on any public transportation facility, except with
the use of earphones or such other device as will limit the reproduction of the
sound only to the hearing of the person operating the radio, television, tape
recorder or phonograph. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1151.20

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
